title: Khloe Kardashian parties at same nightclub as ex-husband Lamar Odom
text:
Khloe and Lamar risked bumping into each other last night (Picture: Backgrid)

Khloe Kardashian was faced with a ghost from her past last night when she wound up partying at the same nightclub as her ex-husband Lamar Odom.

And if that isn’t enough of a coincidence for one evening, Khloe’s sister Kylie Jenner was faced with the risk of bumping into her ex Tyga who was also at the club.

The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star joined her younger sister Kylie, 22, at Hyde nightclub in West Hollywood on Saturday night.

After spending some hours partying inside, Khloe was spotted leaving the venue alone and getting into the back of the car looking pretty tired after her fun outing.

Coincidentally, her former spouse Lamar was seen leaving separately in his own car with his new girlfriend, Sabrina Parr, sat beside him in the driver’s seat.

The ex Los Angeles Lakers basketball star looked pretty pleased with himself after spending a night of partying with his new love.

It’s not known if Khloe, 35, bumped into Lamar, 39, and Sabrina but it might have been a little awkward following reports last week that he had thrown shade at his ex-wife.

Khloe looked about ready to go home (Picture: Backgrid)

Lamar and Sabrina looked as though they had a good night (Picture: Backgrid)

Khloe looked deep in thought (Picture: Backgrid)

In a sweet Instagram post praising his fitness trainer girlfriend, the former NBA star said: ‘Scrollin through @getuptoparr page like DAMN!!! My baby is an extremely hard worker.

‘All NATURAL and real from the inside out. God has bought her in my life for me to reach my full potential and that’s to be Great. I got nuttin but Love for this women.’

Fans believed Lamar used the phrase ‘natural’ as a dig against Khloe.

The pair married in 2009 after just two weeks of dating but split in 2015 before finalising their divorce in 2016.

Khloe has since had a baby, one-year-old True, with boyfriend Tristan Thompson but she ended their relationship in February after he kissed family friend Jordyn Woods.

Lamar went public with his new romance with Sabrina in August and they’ve been pretty smitten since.
